forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 37, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston, the day unfolds under a partly sunny sky, with wispy clouds drifting lazily overhead. The brisk west wind whispers through the trees, a reminder of winter's lingering presence. Although the temperature is hovering near a crisp 37 degrees, it will steadily dip as the afternoon progresses, beckoning you to layer thoughtfully. A warm scarf and a sturdy pair of gloves will provide the comfort necessary against the winds, especially as they gust up to 38 mph, trying to steal away the warmth of your breath.

As evening approaches, expect temperatures to slide down to around 20 degrees, transforming the scenery into a serene, chillier landscape. The soft glow of dusk will invite cozy indoor pursuits, perhaps curling up with a good book or preparing a nourishing homemade soup. For those who venture outside, an evening stroll through the neighborhood might reveal a quiet charm, the stillness accented by a distant laughter echoing from a nearby café. While the day speaks of briskness, it retains an understated beauty, perfect for those wanting to relish in the subtle joys of winter life.
